title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.15 - Procedure for requisition
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 506.15 - Procedure for requisition

State Regulations

When it becomes necessary to requisition (take) under
sections
506.6
and
506.10
of
this Part, State CDC form No. 1 shall be made out in triplicate, as prescribed
in section
506.13
of this Part, except that price shall be omitted. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
506.15

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
